channel.title: Compiler Error
channel.description:
Hi everyone :]! I just have been having problems with my compiler, and I was wondering if anyone could help o.O. It's truly the only thing standing in my way before I can start... SOS :(
Ok a few things you may wanna know;
-This is my first server :].
-I know that my Classpath and Path are fine; I typed "javac" into a cmd prompt and it gave me a long list.
-It is a 317 server
-I can connect to the client and move/train in it.
-I have given myself items in game via the notepad for my character.
-I only have a "Compile"(.bat) file, not a "Compiler"(.bat).. Don't know if that maters but still good to know ;)
-The Compiler file is located a level above my client.java file.
-The message I get when attempting to run the Compiler is --
[QUOTE]
javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac <options> <source files>
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue...
[/QUOTE]
My compiler code is --
[QUOTE]
@echo off
COLOR 02
title Runescape Private Server Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_19\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause
[/QUOTE]
If there is anything else [b]AT ALL [/b] that you need to know, please dont hesitate to tell me :]!! Thanks for even looking at this page,
-DIVINE

item.title: Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @XxDivinexX XxDivinexX
item.description:
@XxDivinexX wrote:

When I put it in the same folder as my java I don’t get an error; but nothing happens o.O’

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“XxDivinexX, post:7, topic:336424”]How do I make it recognize that it should be compiling the client.java file??[/quote]Is your compiler in the same folder as your java files…

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @XxDivinexX XxDivinexX
item.description:
@XxDivinexX wrote:

How do I make it recognize that it should be compiling the client.java file??

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

It’s saying that you don’t have any java files to compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

Just follow the tutorial and make sure everything is set like the tutorial says. Also, make sure the number in the compiler is your current JDK version, if that fails then download a new source and see if that compiler works.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @XxDivinexX XxDivinexX
item.description:
@XxDivinexX wrote:

How can I make sure that they are set correctly =o? Because I can run the source and client fine; and I’m not getting the Path Error :S… Or do you think I should just get a new source?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

Well, by the looks of it, you don’t have your environment variables set correctly. In server tutorials there is a tutorial on how to set environment variables. Try that and if it you have any trouble, send me a PM.

Read full topic
